DOC.brief_summary: To compare compliance satisfaction traditional method blood glucose report use voicemail ( control ) novel method use cell phone /internet ( Confidant ) technology management diabetic pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Managing Diabetes Pregnancy Using Cell Phone/Internet Technology
DOC.detailed_description: Control blood glucose level beneficial pregnancy , however , ability effectively monitor patient 's blood glucose level challenge time consume patient care provider . Patients must keep track glucose level take initiative check blood glucose multiple time per day . Traditionally , patient record glucose level logbook , bring office visit use report glucose level phone . Non compliance factitious reporting uncommon . Obstetricians diabetes program staff spend hour communicate patient obtain record glucose value therefore alternative phone call need . Investigators perform prospective randomize cross study compare conventional voicemail ( control ) system home glucose report cell phone/internet reporting system ( Confidant ) . The primary outcome measure compliance home blood glucose fingerstick reporting . Compliance determine number home glucose fingersticks report / expect ( % ) . The secondary outcome patient satisfaction . Subjects participant Kapiolani Medical Center Women Children 's diabetes pregnancy program know `` A Sweeter Choice '' . IRB approval obtain start study subject receive informed consent . The study fund Hawai ' Medical Service Association , medical insurance company Hawaii . The Confidant equipment supply Hookele Personal Health Planners , LLC . None Ho'okele Hawaii Medical Service Association staff involve data collection analysis . Study subject randomize Confidant control system entry diabetes program consultation Maternal Fetal Medicine physician . After randomization , subject perform assign monitoring system 3 week . After three week , switch monitoring system . A satisfaction survey complete three week second system complete .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman > =18 year gestational diabetes pregestational Type 2 diabetes refer diabetes pregnancy management program 30 week 1 day gestation . Age le 18 year Pregnancy > =30 week 1 day Type I pregestational diabetes Inability speak English
